import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ICounselingServices } from './ICounselingServices'; import { CounselingService } from './counseling.service'; import { error } from 'console'; import { OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-CounselingServices', templateUrl: './CounselingServices.component.html', styleUrls: ['./services-list.component.css'] }) export class CounselingServicesComponent implements OnInit { counselings: ICounselingServices[] = []; pageTitle: string = 'Counseling Services'; counselingServices: ICounselingServices[] = []; errorMessage: string = ''; constructor(private counselingService: CounselingService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.counselingService.getCounselings().subscribe( { next: counselings => this.counselings = counselings, error: err => this.errorMessage = err } ); } }
